604180.name: Fantasy Grounds - Daring Tales of Chivalry #01: A Knights Tale (Savage Worlds)
604180.description:
Daring Tales of Chivalry #01: A Knights Tale
A Fantasy Grounds II Adventure module from Triple Ace Games
When two monks ask Sir David of Winchester and his entourage for help it seems like
a righteous quest is beginning. But the monks of Muchelney Abbey lead a colorful
and interesting life, and their problem is no earthly one.
To save the monks physical bodies, and maybe their eternal souls, the knights must
deal with a divine servant who guards a holy weapon and a French raiding party attacking
southern England before facing down the true monster.
A Knights Tale is a standalone adventure and comes complete with 6 pre-generated
characters.
This product is an installable module for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual
tabletop. The adventure module has been carefully organized to streamline gameplay
and includes, story elements, personalities, items, vehicles and images. These can
be modified within your Fantasy Grounds campaign as needed. The Savage Worlds ruleset
and a Full license of Fantasy Grounds II are required to use this product.
Author: Paul Wiggy Wade-Williams
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Clemens G. Meyer
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Clemens Meyer
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
